name: Windows 95 Design System
description:
Welcome to the completely unoriginal and - obviously not associated with Microsoft - mini Windows 95 Design System on Figma.


Taking inspiration from a number of designers and developers who have created homages to the old school over the years and a recent exercise into recreating a retro component based calculator I have created this fun little project for your enjoyment. ğŸ’¾ğŸ
